name: Mom
text: Good morning, how was your sleep dear?

name: You
text: It was very unsettling as I had a really bad nightmare. More importantly, why are there boards nailed onto the windows and doors?
(You notice your mom averting her eyes as she hesitates to speak.)

name: Mom
text: Well... you see, we can't go outside of the house right now.

name: Mom
text: We can't go outside of the house because when you were sleeping, a deadly virus emerged.

name: Mom
text: Government, health, police, and fire departments are out of service because most of the people outside when it occured turned into a...

name: Mom
text: Volatiles... They are infected people that have lost their cognitive abilities due to the virus.

name: Mom
text: They infect through droplets in the air. Those can render you dead in an instant.

name: Mom
text: The outside is also very dangerous as the virus can kill you immediately. However, this can be countered by wearing a mask.

name: You
text: This feels so unreal! I could've died going outside withoit wearing one. Thank you mom.
